title: Pluralsight - AngularJS Forms Using Bootstrap and MVC 5
description: This course focuses on creating forms with AngularJS, making them look good with Bootstrap styling, and then posting the form data to an ASP.NET MVC 5 web application. UI Bootstrap controls are covered in detail, along with client- and server-side validation. On the server side, this course will show how to work with Web API 2, as well as traditional MVC controllers
